allow: Bash(then psql $DATABASE_URL -c "SELECT column_name, data_type FROM information_schema.columns WHERE table_schema = ''''crm'''' AND table_name = ''''lote'''' AND column_name = ''''data'''';")
Bash(then psql "$DATABASE_URL" -c "SELECT column_name, data_type FROM information_schema.columns WHERE table_schema = ''crm'' AND table_name = ''cliente'' ORDER BY ordinal_position;")
Bash(then psql "$DATABASE_URL" -c "SELECT id, nombre, estado FROM crm.proyecto LIMIT 5;")
Bash(then psql "$DATABASE_URL" -c "SELECT id, nombre, telefono, telefono_whatsapp FROM crm.cliente WHERE nombre = ''prueba2'' LIMIT 1;")

Bash(then psql "$DATABASE_URL" -c "SELECT column_name, data_type, is_nullable FROM information_schema.columns WHERE table_schema = ''crm'' AND table_name = ''cliente'' AND column_name LIKE ''%proyecto%'' ORDER BY ordinal_position;")
Bash(then psql "$DATABASE_URL" -c "SELECT COUNT(*) as total FROM crm.cliente_propiedad_interes;")
Bash(then psql "$DATABASE_URL" -c "SELECT column_name, data_type FROM information_schema.columns WHERE table_schema = ''crm'' AND table_name = ''cliente_interaccion'' ORDER BY ordinal_position;")
Bash(then psql "$DATABASE_URL" -c "SELECT column_name, data_type FROM information_schema.columns WHERE table_schema = ''crm'' AND table_name = ''lote'' AND column_name = ''estado'';")

Bash(then psql "$DATABASE_URL" -c "SELECT r.id, r.codigo_reserva, r.cliente_id, c.nombre as cliente_nombre, r.estado FROM crm.reserva r LEFT JOIN crm.cliente c ON r.cliente_id = c.id ORDER BY r.created_at DESC LIMIT 5;")
Bash(then psql "$DATABASE_URL" -c "SELECT id, codigo_reserva, cliente_id, lote_id, estado, created_at FROM crm.reserva ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 5;")
Bash(then psql "$DATABASE_URL" -c "SELECT column_name, data_type FROM information_schema.columns WHERE table_schema = ''crm'' AND table_name = ''usuario_perfil'' ORDER BY ordinal_position;")
Bash(then psql "$DATABASE_URL" -c "SELECT enumlabel FROM pg_enum WHERE enumtypid = (SELECT oid FROM pg_type WHERE typname = ''estado_lote'');")

Bash(then psql "$DATABASE_URL" -c "SELECT up.id, up.username, r.nombre as rol_nombre FROM crm.usuario_perfil up LEFT JOIN crm.rol r ON up.rol_id = r.id WHERE up.username = ''admin'' OR r.nombre = ''admin'' LIMIT 5;")
Bash(then psql "$DATABASE_URL" -c "SELECT column_name FROM information_schema.columns WHERE table_schema = ''crm'' AND table_name = ''usuario_perfil'' ORDER BY ordinal_position;")
Bash(then psql "$DATABASE_URL" -c "SELECT column_name, data_type FROM information_schema.columns WHERE table_schema = ''crm'' AND table_name = ''recordatorio'' ORDER BY ordinal_position;")
